des:
The official skill of Assassin’s Creed Odyssey, Alexios is designed to be the ultimate tool for life at home and in the game world. 

How to use at Home
With answers to over 500 questions, Alexios is similar to other smart assistants, but has a more Spartan-like attitude. Just open the skill by saying “Alexa, open The Spartan” and then ask any questions that you might ask your usual Alexa-enabled device (e.g. “Alexa, ask The Spartan What’s the weather like?” Alexa, ask The Spartan to set an alarm.”, “Alexa, ask The Spartan to tell me a joke.”).

How to use In-Game*
When you encounter a new locale or point of interest within the game, simply ask Alexios about it, and he’ll unveil the place’s mythological, and sometimes bloody origins. To get your answer immediately just pose a question like:

“Alexa, ask The Spartan to tell me about the Athenian Treasury”
OR
“Alexa, ask The Spartan to tell me about the Battle of the Giants vs Gods”

Write your own epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in Assassin’s Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny and define your own path in a world on the brink of tearing itself apart. Influence how history unfolds as you experience a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.
